Name: The Horseshoe Sling
Ingredients: Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: Like its creator, this is upfront and refreshingly different.
History: Adapted from a drink created by Gary "gaz" Regan , New York, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of The Horseshoe Sling contains 258 calories
